sentences.en: He displayed the cigarette holder grandly on every occasion and had learned to manipulate it adroitly.
sentences.cn: 他学会了一套用手灵巧地摆弄烟嘴的动作,一有机会就要拿它炫耀一番.

sentences.en: He is a holder of an insurance policy.
Her popular pot holder is also available in do-it-yourself kits.
sentences.cn: 她那广受欢迎的防烫布垫也可以自己购买原料套装自己制作。

sentences.en: I said two or three amusing things and Mr. Holder made a few infamous puns.
sentences.cn: 我讲了两、三件有趣的小事,霍尔德先生说了几句不很高明的双关语.

sentences.en: Kasparov became the youngest world title-holder at 22.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕罗夫22岁时成为最年轻的世界冠军。

sentences.en: Laughing, Huggins puffed at his holder.
sentences.cn: 哈金斯笑着吹他的烟嘴.

sentences.en: Season-ticket holders are furious at the rise in rail fares.
sentences.cn: 买季票的人对火车票价上涨极为愤怒。

sentences.en: She is a multiple job holder.
sentences.cn: 她是个兴趣多样的职业者.

sentences.en: Sotomayor, the Cuban holder of the world high jump record, cleared 2.36 metres.
sentences.cn: 古巴的世界跳高纪录保持者索托马约尔跳过了2.36米。

sentences.en: That runner is the holder of the world record for the hundred - yard dash.
sentences.cn: 那位运动员是一百码赛跑世界纪录的保持者.

sentences.en: The bottom of the candle is fused with its holder.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛的底部和烛台熔合在一起.

sentences.en: The cork glass - holder kept the ice from melting and weakening the drink.
sentences.cn: 软木杯套起到了保护冰不速化,酒不走味的作用.
本届奥林匹克运动会冠军

sentences.en: The cutter can be mounted like a pennib in a simple holder.
sentences.cn: 刻刀可象绘图笔一样,固定在简易的刀架上.

sentences.en: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto.
sentences.cn: 本租约持有人有权使用此建筑物以及所附属的土地。

words.tran_cn: 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制
[金融][专利]持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物

phrases.tran_cn: n. 火焰稳定器，稳焰器
煤气容器；煤气筒；储煤气柜
有职业的；国家职员；固定工作者

trans.tran_cn: 支持物，持有者，（支票等）持有人，支托（或握持）…之物
trans.tran_en: someone who owns or controls something
